description: Learn about software sustainability, addressing technical, ecological, economic, and social dimensions to ensure software systems are lasting, adaptable, and responsible. Discover key areas of focus such as agile methodologies, microservices architecture, green software initiatives, open-source collaboration, inclusive design, and ethical standards.
keywords: software sustainability, agile methodologies, microservices architecture, ecological sustainability, green software, economic sustainability, open source, social sustainability, inclusive design, ethical software
title: Software Sustainability: Ensuring Longevity and Responsibility in the Digital Age
